text:
Post Caption Example:
▫️
"I missed my school days", when I use to skip lesson and the 1st thing I do is to get myself a bubble tea. Now with Circuit breaker, I rather attend my lesson, and have a bubble tea with friends when lesson ends. I missed my school friends too. ▪️
Post Covid-19 Circuit Breaker: 🔺#sgunited🇸🇬 #sgunited #stayhomeforsg🔺
🔺#stayhomestaysafesg #stayathomesg🔺
🔺#circuitbreakersg  #sgcircuitbreaker 🔺
🔺#singaporetogether 🔺
Do consider coming over to our studio to shoot yourself in your old school uniform or gather friends together to do so. ▪️
Graduation: 👨‍🎓 👩‍🎓 #sgpromo
▫️
If you know someone who is graduating soon and/or planning for a graduation shoot, do tagged them in this post

Rules & Regulations:
1. Open to all ages and anyone residing in Singapore only. 🇸🇬
2. Current/past picture of your school days and tell us something interesting with the caption "I missed my school days" and describe why. 
3. You have to be in the picture. 
4. If you win, let us know your address, your choice of bubble tea, we will order it and send it to you. Please make sure the bubble tea shop delivers to your home. 
5. The judges reserve the right to delete any inappropriate post which may be offensive, lewd or indecent.
